fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If **Post 3529 is False** or **Post 3528 is True** is rolled in a game, the other role will be forced to spawn.
- If **Post 3529 is False** uses **Over** on you, then regardless of what **Post 3529 is False** has selected **Over** to be, it will do nothing other than alert you of who **Post 3529 is False** is and give you one use of ammo for **None**.
- **Post 3529 is False** or **Post 3528 is True** dies during the course of the game, then the other will be turned into Post 3527 (I Might Not Make It Though) but keep Neutral Paradox as their alignment and gain a win condition of dealing an Unstoppable attack to the player that performs the killing blow on them.
- Conversion immunity
